ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby thread(s)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... FYI - just because the SysOp (a volunteer, btw) knows about it means nothing.  Countless posts of his have been ignored, too. Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:13 AM 3/2/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
>
>Okay folks, some of you have been a bit remiss in your bumping
>duties. Sure the new thread is on page 6 (making a total of 14 pages thus
>far). Yes, the thread had to be split by players. But does that mean we
>give up? Not me ;o)~
>Feel free to stop by and bump it to the moon and back if necessary (oh
>yeah, some lugnut posted a cursing flame that was pulled by the admin, so
>at least THEY know of the thread :oP )
>
>http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/021917.html


FYI - just because the SysOp (a volunteer, btw) knows about it means
nothing. Countless posts of his have been ignored, too.

Talies the Wanderer
